name: elephant-in-a-bottle
description:
I am building an elephant in a bottle

controls:
  • arrow keys / WASD to move
  • Z to undo
  • R to restart
  • escape to return to menu / level select

11 levels of elephant-prodding fun! Jump around if you like; there's a level selector in the main menu.

thank you to incnone and cryss for playtesting!

link to source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=77efccad03902fa962a10cadae1334ce
